meanings.definition: Having or showing the ability to anticipate future events or possibilities.
meanings.sent1: She is farsightedly prepared for any changes that may come.
meanings.sent2: The wise owl made farsightedly decisions to protect its nest.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel farsightedly stored nuts for the winter, planning ahead.
meanings.sent4: His farsightedly vision allowed him to see the bigger picture in life.
meanings.sent5: The captain's farsightedly leadership guided the crew through rough waters.

meanings.definition: In a manner that looks ahead or plans for the future.
meanings.sent1: She farsightedly invested in stocks that later boomed.
meanings.sent2: He always drives farsightedly, anticipating traffic changes.
meanings.sent3: The chef farsightedly prepped ingredients for the busy dinner rush.
meanings.sent4: The architect farsightedly designed buildings that stood the test of time.
meanings.sent5: The explorer farsightedly mapped out the uncharted territory before venturing in.
